official_title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to treat nebulizers as inexpensive or routinely purchased items of durable medical equipment for purposes of part B of the medicare program.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to treat nebulizers as inexpensive or routinely purchased items of durable medical equipment for purposes of part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance) of the Medicare program.

titles.title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to treat nebulizers as inexpensive or routinely purchased items of durable medical equipment for purposes of part B of the medicare program.
